name: Chinese Stir Fried Green Beans
ingredients: 1 pound fresh green beans, ends trimmed
utensils: Steamer or pot with steamer basket

instructions.en: Trim ends of fresh green beans
instructions.ja: インゲン豆の両端を切り落とす

instructions.en: Steam green beans until tender, 7-10 minutes
instructions.sk: Varte zelené fazuľky v pare, kým nezmäknú, 7-10 minút
instructions.ja: インゲン豆を7〜10分蒸して柔らかくする
蒸したインゲン豆の水気をよく切る

instructions.en: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte olej vo veľkej nelepivej panvici na strednom ohni
instructions.ja: 大きな非粘着性フライパンで中火で油を熱する

instructions.en: Sauté Tianjin preserved vegetable, green onions, soy sauce, and MSG for 3 minutes
instructions.sk: Opražte konzervovanú zeleninu Tianjin, jarnú cibuľku, sójovú omáčku a MSG 3 minúty
instructions.ja: 天津漬物、ネギ、醤油、MSGを3分間炒める

instructions.en: Add cooked green beans to the skillet; cook and stir for another 5 minutes
instructions.sk: Pridajte uvarené zelené fazuľky do panvice; varte a miešajte ďalších 5 minút
instructions.ja: 蒸したインゲン豆をフライパンに加え、さらに5分間炒め混ぜる
